message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, $9,500 is significantly below its true worth and the value it offers. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,750?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10,750. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,200. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet at this price.
